question: Indian Science Congress 2018 to be held in __________.
explanation: 2018 edition of Indian Science Congress will be held at Manipur University in Imphal, Manipur in March 2018. This will be the 105th edition of Indian Science Congress. Initially, Indian Science Congress 2018 was scheduled to be held at the Osmania University in Hyderabad, in the first week of January 2018. However, it had to be moved on account of security problems. 'Reaching the Unreached Through Science and Technology' will be the focal theme of this event.
